name: Dniwer
description:
The time continuum is shattering by the time-slimes, assist Dniwner leave the time essence-filled dungeon!

Dniwner's default state is the reverse state, the time state gauge is for the normal state that will regenerate over time, or collect clock too instantly recover some time. 

Pick up pot or stand torch and throw it to the slimes and kill them...temporarily.

Green Slimes drop hearts, revive green slimes to get more hearts.

Red Slimes drop key to open gates. 

CONTROLS:

SPACE : CHANGE TO REWIND STATE/ NORMAL STATE

MOVEMENT KEY WILL BE REVERSED (IF IT IS IN REWIND STATE)

A/ LEFT ARROW KEY :  MOVE LEFT

S / DOWN ARROW KEY : MOVE DOWN

D / RIGHT ARROW KEY : MOVE RIGHT 

W/ UP ARROW KEY : MOVE UP 

NOTE: YOU CAN ONLY INTERACT WITH ANYTHING WHEN YOU ARE IN "NORMAL STATE".

INTERACT CONTROLS:

E : PICKUP ITEM

R: USE/THROW ITEM

Q: REWIND ENEMY (REVIVING THEM)

LSHIFT: PUSH/PULL BOULDERS
